title: Equipotential (EP) test terminal
fullText:
The earth resistance between the EP test terminal and the EP junction or node shall have a maximum value of 0.01 .
EP test terminals shall be stud-type terminals of 6 mm diameter provided with substantial captive fastening nuts and washers having suitable corrosion resistance and electrical conductivity properties. The washers shall be clamped by wing-nuts or large moulded grip-type nuts.
The EP test terminals shall not be used for any purpose other than a test point.
